meanings.sent1: The puppy was a real joy to play with.
meanings.sent2: The sun is real and shines brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe it's real that a cat can dance!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as real as a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The fear in his eyes was real and palpable.

meanings.sent1: She wore a real diamond ring on her finger.
meanings.sent2: His apology seemed real and heartfelt.
meanings.sent3: It's real that the dog thinks he's the boss!
meanings.sent4: The friendship between them was as real as gold.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was real and contagious.

meanings.sent1: The leather bag was real and of high quality.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden looked real and vibrant.
meanings.sent3: It's real that the robot wants to be a human!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as real as a bubbling brook.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the homemade pie was real and delicious.
